article:
Do you know Mickey Mouse? You can see _ in many cartoons . He has two big black _ . He always wears red shorts and white gloves. He was born _ November 18th, 1928. His father is Walt Disney. His _ is Lilian Disney. At first, they call the small mouse Mortimer Mouse. _ Walt Disney's wife, Lilian Disney, doesn't like it. So it's lucky for him to get a _ name Mickey Mouse.
Steamboat Willie is his first cartoon with _ and music. You may ask _ so many people like Mickey. There are _ reasons . The first one is that Mickey is _ a man. He always faces some dangers  by himself. The second one is that Mickey _ so much fun. People like to see the _ man win . Most of them _ to be like Mickey.
Now Mickey lives in Disneyland with his _ , Minnie. They think meeting a lot of people in the park is a(an) _ thing. They feel happy every day.
